name: Betrayal
oracle_text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, you draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes a burden can be borne only on the shoulders of a willing enemy."
—Suq'Ata aphorism

name: Breezekeeper
oracle_text:
Flying
Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)
flavor_text:
"He blows a gust across the cliff to vanish in a breath of wind."
—"Song of the Wind Being"

name: Bull Elephant
oracle_text: When Bull Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.
flavor_text:
Four gray trees and a long, coiling snake. What am I?
—Zhalfirin riddle

name: Cloud Elemental
oracle_text:
Flying
Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"You know you've angered the gods when the clouds turn against you."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Coercion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
A rhino's bargain
—Femeref expression meaning "a situation with no choices"

name: Crypt Rats
oracle_text: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.
flavor_text:
"Once I dreamt of death, but now it dreams of me / And only rats and rotting flesh can hear my silent plea."
—Mundungu chant

name: Dark Privilege
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"As you breathe your last, understand why I accept such forbidden gifts."
—Purraj of Urborg

name: Death Watch
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text:
"Watch death wait / Wait, death, watch / Steal breath swiftly / but steal life slowly."
—Suq'Ata dirge

name: Dwarven Vigilantes
oracle_text: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.
flavor_text: Some dwarves can only be pushed so far.

name: Elven Cache
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"The elves can hide better than most can look."
—Mwani, Mtenda herder

name: Emerald Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Untap target permanent.
• Destroy target non-Aura enchantment.
• Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Fallen Askari
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
Fallen Askari can't block.
flavor_text: In troubled times, there are few greater sorrows than a wayward savior.

name: Feral Instinct
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"If a rhino's head is lower than its shoulders, trust me—it is *not* praying."
—Mwani, Mtenda herder

name: Fireblast
oracle_text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

name: Freewind Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, protection from red
flavor_text:
"That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!"
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

name: Funeral Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player discards a card.
• Target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn.
• Target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)

name: Giant Caterpillar
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"'I've seen hornworms big as a man's fist,' the traveler said, and nodded soberly when our jaws went slack at his ignorance."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Goblin Swine-Rider
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.
flavor_text:
"May you get the mount you deserve."
—Suq'Ata curse

name: Gossamer Chains
oracle_text: Return Gossamer Chains to its owner's hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target unblocked creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"Harah swung his sword mightily, but still the air held him fast."
—Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

name: Hearth Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact creature.
• Attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn.
• Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

name: Hope Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
• Target player gains 2 life.
• Destroy target Aura.

name: Impulse
oracle_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"Controlling time ensures you need never look impulsive again."
—Teferi

name: Infantry Veteran
oracle_text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war."
—Telim'Tor

name: Infernal Harvest
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand.
Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.
flavor_text:
"I offered you eternal life; I just didn't say *where*."
—Shauku, Endbringer

name: Inspiration
oracle_text: Target player draws two cards.
flavor_text:
"Madness and genius are separated only by degrees of success."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Jamuraan Lion
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
The lion blinked
—Femeref expression meaning "situation avoided"

name: Keeper of Kookus
oracle_text: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.
flavor_text: Wanted: Thick-skinned goblin for guarding mean ol' Kookus. Must like fires. Must heal quickly.

name: King Cheetah
oracle_text: Flash
flavor_text:
If you find yourself and a friend being chased by a King Cheetah, you have but one chance: Trip your friend.
—Suq'Ata wisdom

name: Knight of the Mists
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
When Knight of the Mists enters the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you don't, destroy target Knight and it can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: Fear the mists, for they are armed.

name: Knight of Valor
oracle_text:
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
{1}{W}: Each creature without flanking blocking Knight of Valor gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

name: Man-o'-War
oracle_text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Mortal Wound
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
flavor_text:
"Their tears spill over Jamuraa. Mixed with blood, they wash everything red."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Mystic Veil
oracle_text:
You may cast Mystic Veil as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"Magic is my thread, my will the needle. I weave over you as if you never were."
—Poetics of Hanan

name: Panther Warriors
flavor_text:
"When you run you're graceful and swift, sleek as a powerful panther."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Parapet
oracle_text:
You may cast Parapet as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Creatures you control get +0/+1.
flavor_text: There is no wall that can't be improved by making it taller.

name: Phyrexian Walker
flavor_text:
"I have heard terrible tales of black rains, ashen fields, and metal that screams. I have consoled myself that the tales were a myth of some fevered mind. But today I saw a walker—and now I fear the truth."
—Kasib Ibn Naji, Letters

name: Python
flavor_text:
"How can you claim the gods are merciless when they robbed the snake of its limbs to give the other creatures a sporting chance?"
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Quirion Ranger
oracle_text: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Respect the earth, for it will one day be your shield and another day your blanket."
—Liefellen, Quirion exarch

name: Raging Gorilla
oracle_text: Whenever Raging Gorilla blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Every temper tantrum makes another angry gorilla."
—Femeref children's myth

name: Remedy
oracle_text: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose.
flavor_text:
"These things will protect you while I'm gone, remind you of my love for you."
—"Love Song of Night and Day"

name: Resistance Fighter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.
flavor_text:
"My soldiers fought without hesitation, died without doubt."
—Sidar Jabari

name: Righteous Aura
oracle_text: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text:
"Good is not a 'thing.' You can neither touch nor own it. No, Good is a vision we all share and strive to make real."
—Asmira, Holy Avenger

name: River Boa
oracle_text:
Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
{G}: Regenerate River Boa.
flavor_text:
"But no one heard the snake's gentle hiss for peace over the elephant's trumpeting of war."
—Afari, *Tales*

name: Rock Slide
oracle_text: Rock Slide deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures without flying.
flavor_text:
"Good ol' rock. Nothing beats rock."
—Rhirhok, goblin archer

name: Shrieking Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
When Shrieking Drake enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"Kaervek believes the drakes' cries herald his victory; in truth, they mourn aloud for his impending demise."
—Teferi

name: Sisay's Ring
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
flavor_text:
"With this ring, you have friends in worlds you've never heard of."
—Sisay, Captain of the *Weatherlight*

name: Solfatara
oracle_text:
Target player can't play lands this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"A burst of hot air tossed the moon into the air, and the moon liked it up there so much it never needed the ground again."
—Azeworai, "Glitter Moon"

name: Song of Blood
oracle_text: Mill four cards. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.
flavor_text: Purraj sang slaughter and danced death.

name: Spider Climb
oracle_text:
You may cast Spider Climb as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +0/+3 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)

name: Sun Clasp
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.
{W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"And darkness shall be cast from me For my soul resides in the Sun."
—Femeref dirge

name: Suq'Ata Lancer
oracle_text:
Haste
Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
flavor_text:
"Never stop 'til you see your lance come out the other side."
—Telim'Tor

name: Talruum Champion
oracle_text:
First strike
Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: In the Talruum language, there is no word for "surprised."

name: Tar Pit Warrior
oracle_text: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text:
"The cyclops shrugged off savage blows, but casual insults made him weep."
—Azeworai, "The Cyclops who Couldn't"

name: Tremor
oracle_text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
flavor_text:
"Where do you run when the earth becomes your enemy?"
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Undo
oracle_text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.
flavor_text:
"Oft have I wished to undo past deeds, but never did I imagine they would be undone for me."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

name: Urborg Mindsucker
oracle_text: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"My pet will pick the ripe fruit from your tortured brain as if it were hanging from a vine."
—Kaervek

name: Vanishing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)
flavor_text:
"Careless, like a child with fire, so was I with time."
—Teferi

name: Vision Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player mills four cards.
• Choose a land type and a basic land type. Each land of the first chosen type becomes the second chosen type until end of turn.
• Target artifact phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.)

name: Wake of Vultures
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.
flavor_text:
"So the vulture said to the griffin, 'You gonna eat that?'"
—Azeworai, "The Ugly Bird"

name: Warrior's Honor
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"We are to be bound together as the reeds of a basket."
—Asmira, Rashida, and Jabari, unity chant

name: Warthog
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Too much work—it takes a long time to break them in, and more than a few recruits."
—Grebog, goblin swine-rider

name: Wicked Reward
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The blood on my hands is merely proof of my ambition."
—Kaervek
